item.title: This tiny butterfly has the most chromosomes of any animal on Earth
item.description: Scientists have confirmed that the Atlas blue butterfly carries the most chromosomes of any animal, with 229 pairs. Unlike duplication, its chromosome...

item.title: Hubble finds a hybrid galaxy with a mysterious and violent past
